turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning. I need to order a coffee drink from Starbucks to kick off my day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks location did you wan't to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the location at 2698 Route 22 East Union, NJ 07083.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great! I am familiar with that location. What type of coffee drink were you looking to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a cafe latte. Please make it a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so one grande cafe latte. what kind of milk did you want them to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh! I almost forgot! I always get almond milk. Thank you for reminding me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. that's what I am here for.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I always order it just like that. A Grande with Almond milk. Nothing extra fancy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything extra on it? Any special flavors or toppings if they offer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks usually has some things you can add but I prefer my latte just like we already discussed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It sounds delicious. Maybe grab a bite to eat when you pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just might.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. I'll place that order right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is placed at 2698 Route 22 East Union, NJ 07083. It will be ready for pickup on your way to the office.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, but what about my receipt for the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No Problem.
